Dread.name: Dread
Dread.blurb: Standing still or channeling abilities for 1.5 seconds empowers Fiddlesticks with Dread. Immobilizing crowd control resets this timer. Dread grants Movement Speed, but only lasts for 1.5s after Fiddlesticks starts moving.
Dread.description: Innate: Standing still or  channeling abilities for 1.5 seconds grants Fiddlesticks  25 / 30 / 35 / 40% (based on level) bonus movement speed, that lasts for 1.5 seconds once he starts moving. Being  immobilized will not trigger Dread, and will reset the timer.
Dread.description2: After 5 seconds of not moving, Fiddlesticks will stand completely still.
Dread.notes:
* Standing still and basic attacking will not reset Dread's timer.
 Unlike  Guerrilla Warfare Fiddlesticks can perform other actions so long as he does not move.

Terrify.name: Terrify
Terrify.blurb: Strikes a target unit with fear, causing it to flee in terror for a duration.
Terrify.description: Active: Fiddlesticks causes the target enemy to  flee as well as  slowing them by 90%.

Drain.name: Drain
Drain.blurb: Fiddlesticks saps the life force of an enemy, dealing damage to a target over time and healing himself.
Drain.description: Active: Fiddlesticks tethers himself to the target enemy and  channels for up to 5 seconds. While channeling, he deals  magic damage each second, and  heals himself for a percentage of the damage done.
Drain.description2: If the target breaks the tether by moving out of range, Drain ends immediately. If the target dies before the channel completes, the  cooldown is reduced by its remaining duration.
Drain.notes:
* Drain deals damage every 0.25 seconds.
 Drain has a brief channel time (0.1 seconds) on cast before activation.
 Drain's channel will be interrupted if Fiddlesticks performs any other action, uses item actives, or is disabled.
 Using summoner spells (except  Flash and  Teleport) will not interrupt the channel.

 Drain will not continue channeling through  Death Defied or  Icathian Surprise.
 Drain will continue channeling through untargetable abilities ( Playful,  Sanguine Pool) so long as the target remains in tether range.
  Spell shield will block applying the tether but will not block damage from one already applied.

Dark Wind.name: Dark Wind
Dark Wind.blurb: A wisp of wind strikes an enemy unit and then bounces to nearby enemy units, dealing damage and silencing the victims.
Dark Wind.description: Active: Fiddlesticks sends a crow to the target enemy that bounces to nearby enemies up to 5 times, prioritizing targets not yet hit or targets affected by  Drain, dealing magic damage with each bounce and  silencing them for 1.25 seconds once.
Dark Wind.leveling: Magic Damage per Bounce:60 / 80 / 100 / 120 / 140 (+ 45% AP)Total Single-Target Damage:180 / 240 / 300 / 360 / 420 (+ 135% AP)
Dark Wind.description2: Monsters take twice as much damage.
Dark Wind.leveling2: Monster Damage per Bounce:120 / 160 / 200 / 240 / 280 (+ 90% AP)Monster Total Single-Target Damage:360 / 480 / 600 / 720 / 840 (+ 270% AP)
Dark Wind.notes:
* Applies  spell damage in a  area of effect range.
 The crow will vanish if the target becomes  untargetable but will keep on bouncing if the target has died.

Crowstorm.name: Crowstorm
Crowstorm.blurb: A murder of crows flock wildly around Fiddlesticks, dealing damage per second to all enemy units in the area.
Crowstorm.description: Active: After  channeling for 1.5 seconds, Fiddlesticks  blinks to the target location with a murder of crows flying wildly around him for 5 seconds, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies each second.
Crowstorm.leveling: Magic Damage per Second:125 / 175 / 225 / 275 / 325 (+ 45% AP)Total Magic Damage:625 / 875 / 1125 / 1375 / 1625 (+ 225% AP)
Crowstorm.notes:
* Crowstorm applies a tick of damage every 0.5 seconds.
  Grounding effects  interrupt the channel instantly and places Crowstorm on a full  cooldown.
  Roots do not cancel the channel and allows Crowstorm to cast normally.
 The root will still affect him for the remaining duration once he  blinks.
